name: languorous
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
mentally or physically tired or not active, in a way that feels or looks pleasant: I felt warm and languorous. His dark eyes were languorous and heavy-lidded. See
languor
More examplesFewer examplesHe pads across the cobbles with a languorous cowboy amble.She has a very languorous way of talking.Her body seemed too languorous to react quickly to the commands of her brain.
